languages.text: "В точку. Либо с ним произошло что-то настолько травмирующее, что напрочь отшибло память, либо нас водят за нос".

traits.locale_text: "И это делает его куда более опасным противником". {n}С готовностью подхватывает Арбитес.{/n} "Эти киберласераксы, оркестр сервиторов, полумеханический скульптор... Хотел бы я знать, что Руолдо здесь забыл. И что еще может прятать от всеобщих глаз".

languages.text: "Precisely. Either he has had an experience so traumatic as to cause him to altogether lose his memory, or we are being played for fools."
languages.original_text: "В точку. Либо с ним произошло что-то настолько травмирующее, что напрочь отшибло память, либо нас водят за нос".

traits.locale_text: "Precisely. Either he has had an experience so traumatic as to cause him to altogether lose his memory, or we are being led up the garden path."
"Precisely. Either he has had an experience so traumatic as to cause him to altogether lose his memory, or we are being led up the garden path."
"Precisely. Either he has had an experience so traumatic as to cause him to altogether lose his memory, or we are being played for fools."
"Precisely. Either he has had an experience so traumatic as to cause him to altogether lose his memory, or we are being played for fools."
"Precisely. Either he has had an experience so traumatic as to cause him to altogether lose his memory, or we are being played for fools."
"Precisely. Either he has had an experience so traumatic as to cause him to altogether lose his memory, or we are being played for fools."

languages.text: "Präzise. Entweder hatte er ein derart traumatisches Erlebnis, dass er sein Gedächtnis verloren hat, oder wir werden alle zum Narren gehalten."
languages.original_text: "Precisely. Either he has had an experience so traumatic as to cause him to altogether lose his memory, or we are being played for fools."

traits.locale_text: "Präzise. Entweder hatte er ein derart traumatisches Erlebnis, dass er sein Gedächtnis verloren hat, oder wir werden alle zum Narren gehalten."

languages.text: « Exactement. Soit il a vécu une expérience si traumatisante qu'elle lui a fait perdre la mémoire, soit il se moque de nous. »
languages.original_text: "Precisely. Either he has had an experience so traumatic as to cause him to altogether lose his memory, or we are being played for fools."

traits.locale_text: « Exactement. Soit il a vécu une expérience si traumatisante qu'elle lui a fait perdre la mémoire, soit il se moque de nous. »

languages.text: 「その通りです。彼は記憶を完全に失うほどの深刻なトラウマを経験したのです。そうでなければ、誰かに馬鹿にされているのです」
languages.original_text: "Precisely. Either he has had an experience so traumatic as to cause him to altogether lose his memory, or we are being played for fools."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りです。彼は記憶を完全に失うほどの深刻なトラウマを経験したのです。そうでなければ、誰かに馬鹿にされているのです」

languages.text: «Efectivamente. O ha sufrido una experiencia tan traumática como para perder la memoria por completo, o nos están tomando el pelo».
languages.original_text: "Precisely. Either he has had an experience so traumatic as to cause him to altogether lose his memory, or we are being played for fools."

traits.locale_text: «Efectivamente. O ha sufrido una experiencia tan traumática como para perder la memoria por completo, o nos están tomando el pelo».

languages.text: “正是如此。要么是他经历了严重创伤，彻底失去了记忆，要么是我们被耍了。”
languages.original_text: "Precisely. Either he has had an experience so traumatic as to cause him to altogether lose his memory, or we are being played for fools."

traits.locale_text: “正是如此。要么是他经历了严重创伤，彻底失去了记忆，要么是我们被耍了。”

languages.text: "Çok doğru. Ya travma sonucu hafızasını tamamen kaybetmiş ya da hepimizi aptal yerine koyuyor."
languages.original_text: "Precisely. Either he has had an experience so traumatic as to cause him to altogether lose his memory, or we are being played for fools."

traits.locale_text: "Aynen öyle. Ya bir travma sonucu hafızasını tamamen kaybetti ya da hepimizi aptal yerine koyuyor."
